List des Enfants

Liste des enfants
Nom Prenom Age niveau
{{enfant.nom}} {{enfant.prenom}} {{enfant.age}} {{enfant.niveau}}
import { HttpService } from './../../services/http.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-get-all-page', templateUrl: './get-all-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./get-all-page.component.css'] }) export class GetAllPageComponent implements OnInit { enfants : any[]=[]; constructor(private httpService : HttpService , ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getEnfants(); // this.getParents(); // this.getNiveaux(); } getEnfants(){ this.httpService.authGet("enfant") .subscribe({ next: (data: any) => { this.enfants= data.body; console.log(this.enfants) }, error: error => console.log(error) }); } }
